fields.label: Banner or Slider
fields.name: front_page_banner_slider
fields.instructions: Choose between displaying a single banner or a slider on the front page.

fields.label: Banner Overlay Opacity
fields.name: banner_overlay_opacity
fields.instructions: Select the opacity of the slider overlay.

fields.label: Button One Link
fields.name: banner_link_one_external_link
fields.instructions: Use http://

fields.label: Button One Style
fields.name: banner_link_one_style
fields.instructions: Choose a between a button with a background colour or a border.

fields.label: Button Two Link
fields.name: banner_link_two_external_link
fields.instructions: Use http://

fields.label: Button Two Style
fields.name: banner_link_two_style
fields.instructions: Choose a between a button with a background colour or a border.

fields.label: Show Request a Callback Form
fields.name: banner_show_form
fields.instructions: Display a pre-defined request a callback form.

fields.label: Request a Callback Form
fields.name: banner_callback_form
fields.instructions: Paste shortcode for the chosen request a callback form here.

fields.label: RTL Slider
fields.name: rtl_slider
fields.message: Check this to enable RTL for this slider.

fields.label: Slider Overlay Opacity
fields.name: slider_overlay_opacity
fields.instructions: Select the opacity of the slider overlay.

sub_fields.label: Button One Style
sub_fields.name: slider_link_one_style
sub_fields.instructions: Choose a between a button with a background colour or a border.

sub_fields.label: Button Two Style
sub_fields.name: slider_link_two_style
sub_fields.instructions: Choose a between a button with a background colour or a border.

sub_fields.label: Show Request a Callback Form
sub_fields.name: slider_show_form
sub_fields.instructions: Display a pre-defined request a callback form.

sub_fields.label: Request a Callback Form
sub_fields.name: slider_callback_form
sub_fields.instructions: Paste shortcode for the chosen request a callback form here.

fields.label: Gallery Columns
fields.name: project_gallery_columns
fields.instructions: Select the number of images in each row

fields.label: Gallery Content
fields.name: project_gallery_content
fields.instructions: Add extra content to be shown below the gallery images.

fields.label: Subtitle
fields.name: page_subtitle
fields.instructions: Set a custom sub title for a page, post, project, service or team member.

fields.label: Title
fields.name: page_title
fields.instructions: Set a custom title for a page, post, project, service or team member. This overwrites the standard title.

fields.label: Page Title Size
fields.name: page_title_size
fields.instructions: Choose between small and large height for the page title.

fields.label: Page Title Background Settings
fields.name: page_title_background_settings
fields.instructions: Choose whether the page title background will display an image or a background colour.

fields.label: Background Image
fields.name: page_title_background_image
fields.instructions: Choose a background image to be used in the background of the page title area.

fields.label: Background Image Type
fields.name: page_title_background_image_type
fields.instructions: Choose whether the page title background image will be a repeating pattern or a large image that covers the area.

fields.label: Background Image Overlay
fields.name: page_title_background_image_overlay
fields.instructions: Select yes if you choose to display the theme defined overlay colour over the page title background image.

fields.label: Background Colour
fields.name: page_title_background_colour
fields.instructions: Select a background colour for the page title area.

fields.label: Show or Hide Sidebar
fields.name: show_hide_sidebar
fields.instructions: Choose to hide sidebar or display left or right sidebar for this page
